name: Lurking in the dark (Reacast, Amaimon208)
description:
You got stuck in an ancient temple. A mysterious creature has offered its assistance - as long as you will light all the candles in the sanctuary. But beware of the angry ghosts...

TIPS:
If you really get lost, keep going ahead!
Click 'E' to interact and continue dialogue.
You'll need to walk into green light to be able to light up candles (and practically start the game).
There are 14 candles on each (left, right and center) side of the map to light up - game finishes, when you complete task.

Created for the Kiciusie Game Jam 2022.
Everything, besides music and font, was made from scratch.
